Instruction: Rinse the rice under cold water until the water runs clear.
Place the rinsed rice in the rice cooker.
Add the water and salt to the rice cooker.
Close the lid and turn on the rice cooker.
Cook until the rice cooker indicates that the rice is done.
Let the rice sit in the rice cooker for an additional 5-10 minutes to steam.
Fluff the rice with a fork and serve.
